name: Birbforce
description:
Become the most victorious bird in this 2-4 player party game by pooping on as many people and animals as possible. 

You can poop on:

  1. People - cool!
  2. Turtles - wow!
  3. Frogs - frog goes bonk!
  4. Other Birds ... obviously!

You can replenish your poops by destroying sunflowers and eating seed!

If you've ever wanted to dogfight with other birds in a park while pooping on as many living things as you can, this is the game for you!

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • Left Analog Stick to Steer.
  • Press A to Flap
  • Hold A to Slow Down
  • Press B to Poop
  • Hold B to Dive (Let go to ascend!)

KEYBOARD CONTROLS PLAYER 1

  • W-A-S-D to Steer
  • Press [ G ] to Flap
  • Hold [ G ] to Slow Down
  • Press [ H ] to Poop
  • Hold [ H ] to Dive (Let go to ascend!)

KEYBOARD CONTROLS PLAYER 2

  • Arrow Keys to Steer
  • Press [ . ] to Flap
  • Hold [ . ] to Slow Down
  • Press [ / ] to Poop
  • Hold [ / ] to Dive (Let go to ascend!)

Made by Laurence Valentini and Robert Gross.
